content:
ICompositeViewEvents Interface

Definition

Handles events that can occur during the display of ICompositeView items.

In this Article

public interface ICompositeViewEvents

Remarks

A view is usually composed of various loosely coupled visual components.

Methods

RegisterCompositeView(ICompositeView)

Registers the custom controls that are viewed during execution of a composite application.

public void RegisterCompositeView (System.Activities.Presentation.ICompositeView container);
container
ICompositeView

An object that contains the custom controls to be registered.

Remarks

Registration of view components into a virtual table provides developers with a concise way to handle custom controls in a composite application.

RegisterDefaultCompositeView(ICompositeView)

Registers the default controls that are viewed during execution of a composite application.

public void RegisterDefaultCompositeView (System.Activities.Presentation.ICompositeView container);
container
ICompositeView

An object that contains the default controls to be registered.

UnregisterCompositeView(ICompositeView)

Unregisters the custom controls that are viewed during execution of a composite application.

public void UnregisterCompositeView (System.Activities.Presentation.ICompositeView container);
container
ICompositeView

An object that contains the custom controls to be unregistered.

UnregisterDefaultCompositeView(ICompositeView)

Unregisters the default controls that are viewed during execution of a composite application.

public void UnregisterDefaultCompositeView (System.Activities.Presentation.ICompositeView container);
container
ICompositeView

An object that contains the default controls to be unregistered.
